advancement.create.andesite_alloy.desc: Obtain some Andesite Alloy, Create's most important resource
advancement.create.andesite_casing.desc: Apply Andesite Alloy unto stripped timber, fashioning a humble housing for thy mechanical Apparatuses
advancement.create.anvil_plough.desc: Launch an Anvil by the Ploughs Mechanickal
advancement.create.arm_blaze_burner.desc: Command a Mechanickal Arm to stoke thy Blaze Burner
advancement.create.arm_many_targets.desc: Program a Mechanickal Arm with tenfold or more delivery stations
advancement.create.backtank.desc: Craft a Copper Backtank and let it gather breath’d pressure
advancement.create.belt.desc: Fasten two Shafts with a Belt Mechanickal
advancement.create.belt_funnel_kiss.desc: Let twain Funnels upon Belt doth smooch\n§7(Hidden Advancement)
advancement.create.brass.desc: Smelt Brass Ingots by mingling Copper and Zinc in thy Mixer, heated by Blaze
advancement.create.brass_casing.desc: Lay Brass upon stripped timber to shape housing for machines far refined
advancement.create.cardboard.desc: Bring forth or receive thy first Cardboard
advancement.create.cardboard_armor: Now thou beholdest me—anon, I vanish from thine eyes
Adorn thy Cardboard Armour with noble Trimmings\n§7(Hidden Advancement)
advancement.create.cart_pickup.desc: Lift a Minecart Contraption bearing 200 blocks or more
advancement.create.chained_drain.desc: Behold an item roll across a train of Drains\n§7(Hidden Advancement)
advancement.create.chocolate_bucket.desc: Procure a bucket of liquid chocolate
advancement.create.chute.desc: Transport thy wares through yon Chute
advancement.create.clockwork_bearing.des: Assemble a moving structure ‘pon a Clockwork Bearing
advancement.create.compacting.desc: Employ Press and Basin to compress many into few
advancement.create.conductor.desc: Deliver a Schedule to thy Train's steersman
